damage_relations.relation_type: adjacent_to | causes | consequence_of | overlaps | extends_into | propagates_from | intersects_with | part_of | similar_to

relation_vocabulary.adjacent_to: The damage is physically next to another damage without direct causation.
relation_vocabulary.causes: The damage directly leads to or contributes to another damage.
relation_vocabulary.consequence_of: The damage is the result of another damage.
relation_vocabulary.overlaps: The damage spatially overlaps with another damage region.
relation_vocabulary.extends_into: The damage continues or expands into another element or damage region.
relation_vocabulary.propagates_from: The damage originates at another damage and spreads outward.
relation_vocabulary.intersects_with: The damage crosses paths with another damage.
relation_vocabulary.part_of: The damage is a sub-component of a larger damage pattern.
relation_vocabulary.similar_to: The damage has similar characteristics (e.g., size, pattern, orientation) to another damage.
